is this the game? its only 18 mb!!

There is no additional content added to the Wii version in comparison to the SNES version.. that is why the file is so small (as is often the case with WBFS files). This is the complete game, however, do not always assume so.
this is not the wii version,the graphics are the snes version.the game was touched up for the wii but this is not it.
